title: Collaborative Discourse-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Simulation Process

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Real-time collaborative learning environment using smartphone-based CMC tools

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% participation rates in collaborative problem-solving processes using CMC tools with peers in VR simulation environments
Learners can propose at least three alternative solution strategies in mathematical reasoning processes and incorporate peer feedback
Learners can perform at least five peer-evaluation activities through digital platforms and adhere to constructive feedback criteria at 90% compliance

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
